title: Communication of the Trump administration during the COVID-19 pandemic

We need to lead the way with science — not Donald Trump’s record of hysteria, xenophobia, and fear-mongering. <ref>https://www.air.tv/watch?v=H5sOhceASMejHrTIrzrVZg</ref> <ref>https://www.washingtonexaminer.com/opinion/yes-biden-absolutely-did-oppose-the-china-travel-restrictions-and-call-them-xenophobic</ref>

title: Communication of the Trump administration during the COVID-19 pandemic
added: On the following day,February1,democraticpresidential candidate Joe Biden calledTrump'sChinatravel ban xenophobic stating, “We are in the midst of a crisis with the coronavirus. We need to lead the way with science — not Donald Trump’s record of hysteria, xenophobia, and fear-mongering. <ref>https://www.air.tv/watch?v=H5sOhceASMejHrTIrzrVZg</ref> <ref>https://www.washingtonexaminer.com/opinion/yes-biden-absolutely-did-oppose-the-china-travel-restrictions-and-call-them-xenophobic</ref>

title: Communication of the Trump administration during the COVID-19 pandemic
added: On April 1, Trump falsely asserted that Americans were being tested for COVID-19 as they got on and off planes and trains.<ref>{{Cite web|date=1 April 2020|title=“Now, they’re doing tests on airlines — very strong tests — for getting on, getting off. They’re doing tests on trains — getting on, getting off.”|url=https://www.poynter.org/?ifcn_misinformation=now-theyre-doing-tests-on-airlines-very-strong-tests-for-getting-on-getting-off-theyre-doing-tests-on-trains-getting-on-getting-off|url-status=live|access-date=2021-03-19|website=Poynter|language=en-US}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|last=Dale|first=Daniel|date=6 April 2020|title=Fact check: Trump falsely claims plane and train passengers are being tested for the coronavirus|url=https://www.cnn.com/2020/04/02/politics/fact-check-trump-plane-and-train-passengers-tested-for-the-coronavirus/index.html|url-status=live|access-date=2021-03-19|website=CNN}}</ref>

title: Communication of the Trump administration during the COVID-19 pandemic
added: On August 2, Dr. Deborah Birx appeared on CNN and warned of a new surge.<ref>{{Cite web|last=Stracqualursi|first=Veronica|date=2 August 2021|title=Birx warns US is 'in a new phase' of coronavirus pandemic with more widespread cases|url=https://www.cnn.com/2020/08/02/politics/birx-coronavirus-new-phase-cnntv/index.html|url-status=live|access-date=2021-03-28|website=CNN}}</ref> Afterward, she received a "very uncomfortable" and "very difficult" phone call from Trump, though she did not reveal this publicly until the following year.<ref>{{Cite web|last=Howard|first=Jacqueline|last2=Kelly|first2=Caroline|date=28 March 2021|title=Birx recalls 'very difficult' phone call from Trump following her Covid-19 warnings|url=https://www.cnn.com/2021/03/28/politics/birx-trump-covid-very-uncomfortable-phone-call/index.html|url-status=live|access-date=2021-03-28|website=CNN}}</ref>
